main event: On 24 November 1951, multiple sightings of an unidentified flying object were reported in Michigan, with descriptions including a long, white, cigar-shaped object with a red trail moving north to south.
interesting points: The object was estimated to be at an altitude of 4,220 feet and a speed over 400 mph., Two men at Selfridge Air Force Base reported a similar UFO sighting moving at a rapid rate of speed with no noise., A Capital Airlines pilot also sighted a similar object, describing it as moving intelligently and changing direction., Radar operators confirmed tracking the object at times, including a tower operator at Kent City Airport., Reports indicated that the sightings were not consistent with known aircraft or meteorological phenomena.
sighted object: long, white, cigar-shaped object with a red trail
witness description: military and civilian observers including pilots and tower operators
